duties_responsibilities.duty: Lead strategic AI/ML and experimentation initiatives across AWS Marketing & Sales.
Develop large-scale, high-performing AI/ML models and rapid experimentation capabilities.
Advance the state of the art in recommender engines, rapid experimentation at scale, and marketing science.
Design and support large-scale optimization systems in a production environment.
Engage in experiment system design and contribute to the advancement of recommender systems.

education_certification.credential: Ph.D. in Applied Research with a focus on AI/ML or related field (Master's degree required)
Proven track record of publications and research contributions
